name: Demonition
description:
A fun and original smash game, where you have to stop demons invasion, but remember, don't kill angels !

The game is suitable for any public, all you have to do is taping/touching the screen.

Don't be fooled by first levels which are very easy, as you advance in the game, new demons races will apear, each one having new capabilities making it harder to kill.

For those who love the challenge, you can compete with your friends on survival mode, get the best score and enter the top players leader board !

A game by Ezelia
